text: EqvainaqM BUti#M gamayantyaqsau vA EqtasyA#&&*diqtyO rucaqmA da#ttEq yO$&gniM ciqtvA na rOca#tEq yadA#dityEShTaqkA u#paqdadhA$tyaqsAvEq-vAsmi#nnAdiqtyO ruca#M dadhAtiq yathAq&sau dEqvAnAq(gm)q rOca#ta EqvamEqvaiSha ma#nuqShyA#NA(gm) rOcatE GRutEShTaqkA upa# dadhAtyEqtadvA aqgnEH priqyaM dhAmaq yad-GRuqtaM priqyENaiqvainaqM dhAmnAq sama#d^^rdhayaqtya - [  ] 42
